SELECT f_id, f_code, f_game_id, f_start_time, f_end_time, f_finish_time, f_result, f_status FROM t_period ORDER BY f_start_time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT f_id, f_code, f_game_id, f_start_time, f_end_time, f_finish_time, f_result, f_status FROM t_period WHERE f_game_id = #{gameId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND #{nowTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} >= f_start_time AND #{nowTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} < f_finish_time

SELECT f_id, f_code, f_game_id, f_start_time, f_end_time, f_finish_time, f_result, f_status FROM t_period WHERE f_game_id = #{gameId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND f_start_time <= #{nowTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ORDER BY f_code DESC LIMIT 1,1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_period ( f_code, f_game_id, f_start_time, f_end_time, f_finish_time, f_result, f_status ) SELECT CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(#{value}, '%Y%m%d'), LPAD(f_code, 3, '000')) AS f_code, f_game_id, DATE_ADD(#{value}, INTERVAL f_start_time HOUR_SECOND) AS f_start_time, DATE_ADD(#{value}, INTERVAL f_end_time HOUR_SECOND) AS f_end_time, DATE_ADD(#{value}, INTERVAL f_finish_time HOUR_SECOND) AS f_finish_time, '' AS f_result, 0 AS f_status FROM t_period_template ORDER BY f_id
mapper.update: UPDATE t_period SET f_result = #{result, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_status = 1 WHERE f_id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER};
